title: Funeral prayers of martyred Constable Mubashir offered at Rawalpindi Police Lines
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 25 (APP):The funeral prayers of Punjab Police Constable Muhammad Mubashir Bilal, who was martyred due to violence by protesters in Hakla, was offered at Rawalpindi Police Lines.
Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi alongwith Corps Commander Rawalpindi, Inspector General of Punjab Police, Rawalpindi’s CPO, Deputy Commissioner, high-ranking officials, senior officials and, officers and jawans of law enforcement agencies,  attended the funeral prayers.
A smartly turned-out contingent of police presented a guard of honor to martyred constable.
Mohsin Naqvi, Corps Commander Rawalpindi, and Inspector General of Punjab Police laid floral wreaths at the grave
Mohsin Naqvi said that the nation paid tribute to the brave son of Punjab Police, who sacrificed his life in the line of duty.
The minister prayed for his high ranks in the Jannah.
